---
pagetitle: "Funders"
format: 
  html:
    page-layout: full
    toc: false
---

<style>
:root {
  --theme-main: #00883A;
  --theme-bg: #f5f6fa;
  --theme-card-bg: #fff;
  --theme-card-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(43,134,75,0.10);
  --theme-border: #e3e7ed;
}

body {
  margin: 0;
  min-height: 100vh;
}

.content-container{
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 2rem auto;
  padding: 0 1.5rem;
}


.header-section {
  font-size: 2.6rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color:var(--theme-main);
  letter-spacing: -0.5px;
}

.intro-text {
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  color: #4a5568;
  line-height: 1.85;
  margin-top:0.6rem;
  margin-bottom: 1.1rem;
  text-align: justify;
  width:100%;
}

/* styling for logo*/
.logo-img{
  padding:1rem;
  padding-top:2rem;
  align-content: center;
}
.logo-img img {
  width: 100px;   
  height: auto;   
  object-fit: contain; 
}

.vw-logo img{
  width: 170px;   
  height: auto;   
  object-fit: contain; 
}


.member-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 280px 800px;
  grid-template-rows: auto;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.member-grid-item {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: flex-start;
  background: var(--theme-card-bg);
  border-radius: 5px;
  box-shadow: var(--theme-card-shadow);
  border: 1.5px solid var(--theme-border);
  padding: 0.5rem;
  text-align: center;
  transition: transform 0.13s, box-shadow 0.13s;
  height: 300px; 
  min-width: 200px;
  max-width: 320px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.member-grid-item:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.025);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(43,134,75,0.15);
  border-color: var(--theme-main);
}


.profile-link {
  display: contents;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
  height: 100%;
}

.member-grid-name {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--bs-gray-700);
  margin-bottom: 0.3rem;
  line-height: 1.4;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  text-align: center;
  overflow: hidden;
  cursor: default;
  min-height: 2em;
}

.social-link {
  display: inline-flex;         
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.4rem;
  background: none;              
  box-shadow: none;               
  color: var(--theme-main);                 
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 0.9rem;              
  width: auto;                  
  height: auto;                 
  border: 1px solid #e3e7ed;                  
  border-radius: 4px;              
  padding: 0.3rem 0.6rem;                   
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: color 0.2s, border-color 0.2s;
}

.social-link i {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  line-height: 1;      
  margin: 0; 
}

.social-link:hover {
  background-color:rgba(43, 134, 75, 0.98);
  color: white;
  border-color:var(--theme-main);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.description-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-start;
}

.description-text {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: #4a5568;
  line-height: 1.85;
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  overflow: hidden;
  max-height: calc(1.2rem * 1.85 * 8);
  width: 100%;
  text-align: justify;

}

hr {
    border: 0;
    height: 1px;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5));
    margin: 20px 0;
    grid-column: 1 / -1; 
  }

.funding-details{
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  align-items:center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  justify-content: flex-start;
}

.funding-list .funding-name,
.funding-project{
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: #4a5568;
  line-height: 1.85;
}
.funding-list .funding-date{
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.85;
}
.funding-list .funding-amt{
  border-radius: 14px;
  cursor: default;
  color: #4a5568;
}
.funding-list .funding-amt:hover{
  background-color: #00883b45;
  color:white;
}

@media (max-width: 900px) {
  .member-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .member-grid-item,
  .description-container {
    text-align: center;
  }

  .description-text {
    text-align: left;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .header-section {
    font-size: 2.2rem;
  }
  .intro-text {
    font-size: 1.05rem;
  }
}

</style>
